title: Guidelines - Adding a Second Smart Key

body.body: Guidelines - Adding a Second Smart Key

This instruction provides a brief outline of the process for pairing a second smart key. The instruction assumes the motorcycle is in its delivered condition, with one smart key and two passive keys paired.
Obtain all available motorcycle keys from the owner.
Power the motorcycle ON using the original smart key.
The pairing of the smart key used to power the motorcycle ON is retained.
The two passive keys are registered as inactive.
Press the smart key button to lock the new smart key to the keyless ECM.
The motorcycle now has two smart keys and one passive key paired.
The second passive key is stored as an erased key in the keyless ECM memory.
The erased passive key can be later paired and reactivated, in the event that one of the paired keys is lost.
Attach a suitable label or key fob to the erased passive key to aid future identification.
